Title: Directs the president of the state civil service commission to publish reports annually relating to diversity within state government
Summary: Directs the president of the state civil service commission to publish reports annually relating to diversity within executive state agencies, authorities, boards, bureaus, commissions, departments and divisions under executive control.
LawCode: Amd ยง1, Chap of 2021 (as proposed in S.4746 & A.2439)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend a chapter of the laws of 2021 relating to directing the president of the state civil service commission to publish reports relating to diversity within the state government, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 4746 and A. 2439, in relation to diversity within executive state agencies, authorities, boards, bureaus, commissions, departments and divisions under executive control
